channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drug dealing, 10th December
item.description:
10/12/2025 22:15 drug dealing on top of T GREEN leading into Bostal Woods off of Wickham Lane accessed between Bastion Road and Rutherglen Road.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bastion Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing / Full Bins, 10th December
item.description:
Not Been Emptied for over two weeks! General waste and dog poop bins full and some overflowing in East Wickham Open Space!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pinecroft, East Wickham, Greater London

item.title: Swan St resident strikes again, 10th December
item.description:
The resident of 20 Sean St yet again thinks they can dump their waste on Truo.Place yet again How is this allowed to continue You have their address so why are they carrying on dumping You clearly.aren’t issuing penalties

item.title: Pothole 100mm deep 1.5m X 1.5m down to sub base, 10th December
item.description:
Very deep pothole down to concrete sub base at least 100mm deep. Size of road damage 1.5m X 1.5m. Cars swerving to avoid. In middle of road. B13 bus route. Outside 4 Sandhurst Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandhurst Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken branch from tree, 10th December
item.description:
I think the tree is dead the top part is partially fallen. And is hanging off. People have broken and moved the branches in reach. But I think the whole upper branch is in danger of falling. I have reported this stretch of pathway from st Thomas drive to Shepperton as in need of observation there are many dead trees over hanging this pathway. It is a very high traffic foot path used by all including school children to crofton

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heathside, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Build up leafs had sweep them my self for last few weeks now, my brown bin is full needs emptying now because this , only been sweep once this year , in which it blocks drain if not done then floods rd

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mottingham Road, Coldharbour, Greater London

item.title: Rubbish everywhere, 10th December
item.description:
There's a massive pile of domesticamd food waste outside a property. I believe this property to be an air BnB so there's no owner around to discuss with I feel it is unfair to have to walk past this daily and have to clear the mess the foxes and rats are being through our gardens. Bin men have been leaving the bins as they are over flowing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights out in Valette House, 10th December
item.description:
The lights are out on the whole estate, they come around 16:30, then go off around 20:00. It’s been reoccurring for at least 2 weeks.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Valette Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Left over plastic fencing etc from pathway works, 10th December
item.description:
This fencing etc has been left on the grass verge in The Avenue, Bexley, since paving works were finished around 13 October. They have fallen into the road or onto the paving and I have had to pick them up as they represent an obstruction. They get blown over in the wind, across the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Avenue, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A shite storm of litter on the road, 10th December
item.description:
Massive amounts of litter and overflowing bins on the top end of Rushmore Road creating a health and safety hazard for all the children walking past to get their education at Millfield school

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Saratoga Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
